item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: The Coens are remaking true fucking grit???? That is one of my all time favorite duke movies!!!!!
item.content:encoded: The Coens are remaking true fucking grit???? That is one of my all time favorite duke movies!!!!!

item.title: By: Marcus Rosentrater
item.dc:creator: Marcus Rosentrater
item.description:
Merry Christmas Will!
I'm glad you're back in Surabya... at least maybe you'll connect more.
I'm in Tampa with the In-Laws. I've been watching some Chris Marker. Also we all watched White Christmas. With my father in law I always watch westerns from Movies Worth Seeing. This visit we watched Left-Handed Gun, True Grit (preparing for the Coen Brothers remake), and The Cowboys. Besides not being able to see my family in Colorado, it's been a good Christmas by all accounts.
P.S. I love your Christmases as a young little Will-er-snapper.
item.content:encoded:
Merry Christmas Will!

I’m glad you’re back in Surabya… at least maybe you’ll connect more.

I’m in Tampa with the In-Laws. I’ve been watching some Chris Marker. Also we all watched White Christmas. With my father in law I always watch westerns from Movies Worth Seeing. This visit we watched Left-Handed Gun, True Grit (preparing for the Coen Brothers remake), and The Cowboys. Besides not being able to see my family in Colorado, it’s been a good Christmas by all accounts.

P.S. I love your Christmases as a young little Will-er-snapper.

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Thanks Amy, Thanks Ryan, Have a merry christmas. You too, little Joe.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Amy, Thanks Ryan, Have a merry christmas. You too, little Joe.

item.title: By: Amy Bugg Burke
item.dc:creator: Amy Bugg Burke
item.description: I'm so glad you wrote this Will...as we were getting out of the car tonight coming home from my Grandmother's house, Ryan suddenly said, "It's already Christmas in Indonesia!" So we were thinking of you, and it's nice to be able to picture how you are spending your holidays. We are watching "A Christmas Story" ("Scrooged" was last night), and waiting for Santa to show up. Joseph is thumping away in my belly right now, so I think that means he wants to wish you a Merry Christmas too, and tell you that he can't wait to meet you this summer. So, Merry Christmas Will, from the whole Burke family!! We love you and miss you!
item.content:encoded: I’m so glad you wrote this Will…as we were getting out of the car tonight coming home from my Grandmother’s house, Ryan suddenly said, “It’s already Christmas in Indonesia!” So we were thinking of you, and it’s nice to be able to picture how you are spending your holidays. We are watching “A Christmas Story” (“Scrooged” was last night), and waiting for Santa to show up. Joseph is thumping away in my belly right now, so I think that means he wants to wish you a Merry Christmas too, and tell you that he can’t wait to meet you this summer. So, Merry Christmas Will, from the whole Burke family!! We love you and miss you!
